Settings.name: Enable Extension
Settings.description: Master switch to enable or disable all Newtube styles.

Settings.name: Check Static video (for Background VDO & Remove black bars)
Theme colors base on video thumbnail
Settings.description: Dynamically changes theme based on the video thumbnail. (This is a BETA feature and requires custom function execution in StyleShift)
Settings.enable_function: var WhenChangeVideo_Update_Theme_by_video; async function Start_Theme_by_video() { if (!WhenChangeVideo_Update_Theme_by_video) { WhenChangeVideo_Update_Theme_by_video = WhenYoutubeChangePage(function () { update(); }); } } Start_Theme_by_video();
Settings.disable_function: async function Stop_Theme_by_video() { if (WhenChangeVideo_Update_Theme_by_video) { WhenChangeVideo_Update_Theme_by_video.Stop(); WhenChangeVideo_Update_Theme_by_video = null; } } Stop_Theme_by_video();

Settings.name: Enable Changing Video transition
End of video chanel hover background color
(Under Video) Move tittle to the center
Auto Enter Theater Mode
Settings.enable_function: async function AutoTheaterMode() { if (Get_Value("AutoTheater") == true) { let GetTheaterButton = await WaitForElement(`.ytp-size-button`); if (GetTheaterButton) { let IsPlayerInNormalMode = await WaitForElement(`#player .html5-video-player`); if (IsPlayerInNormalMode) { GetTheaterButton.click(); await sleep(1000); IsPlayerInNormalMode = await WaitForElement(`#player .html5-video-player`); if (IsPlayerInNormalMode) { AutoTheaterMode(); } } } } } AutoTheaterMode();

Settings.name: Auto Picture In Picture mode
Settings.description: Please click anywhere In page after you back to page (Security problem)

Settings.name: Auto exit Picture In Picture mode
Auto Remove YouTube's Ambient Mode
Settings.enable_function: var RunningRemoveDefaultAmbient = false; function StartRemoveDefaultAmbient() { if (RunningRemoveDefaultAmbient) return; RunningRemoveDefaultAmbient = true; async function RemoveDefaultAmbient() { if (document.getElementById("cinematics")) { document.getElementById("cinematics").remove(); RunningRemoveDefaultAmbient = false; } else { await sleep(100); RemoveDefaultAmbient(); } } RemoveDefaultAmbient(); } StartRemoveDefaultAmbient();

Settings.name: Move to center

Settings.setup_function: alert('FontManager is a complex feature and needs to be re-implemented in StyleShift.');

Settings.name: Enable Additional CSS
Settings.enable_function: var AddCSS_Style; async function CreateAddCSS_Style() { AddCSS_Style = document.createElement("style"); AddCSS_Style.id = "NewtubeAddCSS"; var Head = await GetDocumentHead(); Head.append(AddCSS_Style); } async function UpdateAddCSS() { if (!AddCSS_Style) return; AddCSS_Style.textContent = await Get_Value("ADDCUSTOM"); } async function StartAddCSS() { if (!AddCSS_Style) { CreateAddCSS_Style(); } UpdateAddCSS(); } StartAddCSS();
Settings.disable_function: async function StopAddCSS() { if (AddCSS_Style) { AddCSS_Style.remove(); AddCSS_Style = null; } } StopAddCSS();

Settings.description: Additional CSS code to be appended.

Settings.name: Enable General UI Styles
Enable Video Player Styles
Enable Thumbnails & Grids Styles
Enable Layout, Buttons & Popups Styles
